soap.local.api

Class IMessagingToolsAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.soap.SOAPServiceBase
      • soap.local.api.IMessagingToolsAPI

  • public class IMessagingToolsAPI
extends SOAPServiceBase
    MessagingTools is a remote interface to a set of tools to get messaging statistics and perform operations on messages. @deprecated Since 8.0.0. Please use the ab800 package.

      MessageOptionalFields acknowledgeMessage(Acknowledgement ack)
      Acknowledges message
      @deprecated
      int getMessageId(String senderRefID, int destinationID)
      Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If the destination id passed in is -1, then this would find messages from any destination that matches the sender ref id. Returns -1 if no message is found that has given sender ref id and destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will return the first one.
      @deprecated

      @deprecated
      boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID, int retryLimit)
      Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination where the message has previously been retried fewer than retryLimit times. Each message maintains a retry count; attempts to retry the message increment the retry count. If there are messages whose retry count >= retryLimit, they will not be retried.

      Specifying a retryLimit of 0 retries all retryable error messages, and is identical to retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID).
      @deprecated

      Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination and error category,

      • getMessageId

        int getMessageId(String senderRefID,
               int destinationID)
        Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If the destination id passed in is -1, then this would find messages from any destination that matches the sender ref id. Returns -1 if no message is found that has given sender ref id and destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will return the first one.
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - The sender ref id for the message we want to get
        destinationID - The destination id for the message we want to get. -1 would match all destination ids.
        Returns:
        message id, or -1 if message is not found

        safeOrderedObjectId - The public id of the safe ordered object of interest
        Returns:
        the message statistics for the specified destination and safe order object

      • retryMessage

        boolean retryMessage(int messageID)
        Retries a single message (retryable error or inflight).
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message to retry.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the message was successfully retried. If the message with this messageID does not exist, this returns false. If the message is not a retryable error message or an inflight message, this returns false. Returning true does not necessarily mean that the retry was successful; it just means that the message was retried.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessages

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID)
        Retries all messages in retryable error state for the given destination.
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessages

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID,
                                  int retryLimit)
        Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination where the message has previously been retried fewer than retryLimit times. Each message maintains a retry count; attempts to retry the message increment the retry count. If there are messages whose retry count >= retryLimit, they will not be retried.

        Specifying a retryLimit of 0 retries all retryable error messages, and is identical to retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID).
        @deprecated

        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        retryLimit - Retry only messages with retryCount < retryLimit; if retryLimit is 0, retry all messages.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessagesForCategory

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessagesForCategory(int destID,
                                             ErrorCategory category)
        Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination and error category,
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        category - The error category of the messages that should be retried.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • skipMessage

        boolean skipMessage(int messageID)
        Skips a single message (error or inflight).
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message to skip.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the message was successfully skipped. If the message with this messageId does not exist, this returns false. If the message is not in an active state(active states are: pending send, inflight, error, retryable error and pending retry), this returns false.

      • suspendDestination

        void suspendDestination(int destID)
        Suspends the destination with the specified destination id
        @deprecated
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination id of the destination to suspend
